author: Suyin Haynes
title: ‘You Must Wash Properly.’ Newspaper Ads From the 1918 Flu Pandemic Show Some Things Never Change
description: While medicine has advanced since 1918, these newspaper ads from the time of the Spanish flu show that some things never change.
content: As governments and societies across the world struggle with the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, and scientists look to modelling to see how various approaches might impact the worldwide trajectory of the virus, some observers are drawing comparisons to another pan… [+6099 chars]
